ygData.subject: Re: Full Report!
ygData.msgSnippet: The coin quest is from the new sol-temple, and they want 10 coins all together. ... From: Andreas Sundgren  To:
ygData.messageBody:
The coin quest is from the new sol-temple, and they want 10 coins all
together.


-----Original Message-----
From: Andreas Sundgren <the.only.asu@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, October 04, 1999 5:26 AM
Subject: SV: [EQ_Tinkering] Full Report!


>From: "Andreas Sundgren" <the.only.asu@...>
>
>
>>From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>>
>
>---
>
>>I found, on the ground, an item called An old silver coin. It looked like
a normal
>>silver coin, but it was an actual item. The strangest thing, though was
that
>>it was a MAGIC ITEM, a LORE ITEM, AND...NO DROP!
>
>
>Not that I try to discourage you, but the coin is supposed to be for the
Enchanter quest for a high level spell, Tashania.
>The coins have only been in the game for about three weeks, so I doubt that
they have anything to do with it.
>
>But the Idea of searching under water sounds possible, I mean, how many
people have actually been in places like Kedge Keep...
>
>So, keep on searching.
>
>/Tmira - Gnome Enchantress on Bristlebain
>
>>
